Author: jamongkad
Content: Dunno but I think your on to something here. Only one way to find out if your idea works though...

Author: jamongkad
Content: Admittedly I'm guilty of this...adding too many features to any app be it web or desktop. Just goes to show you that the KISS principle is still alive and kicking.

Author: zach
Content: Maybe it's for the best.  It'll probably be better to read it when it's (presumably) edited into essay form.
